sentences.sentence: Staff members are trained to treat customers with civility at all times.
sentences.translation: 全体职员接受训练，以便在任何时候对顾客都以礼相待。

sentences.sentence: Japanese people have shown great civility amid this massive natural disaster and there have been no instances of looting.
sentences.translation: 在这次巨大的自然灾难中， 日本人民表现出了极好的社会公德，没有发生任何抢劫事件。
